00013 bool Event::Ok() {
00014   return Err() == EVENT_OK;
00015 }
00016 
00017 Event::~Event() {
00018   delete queue_;
00019 }
00020 
00021 void Event::Init() {
00022   Err(EVENT_OK);
00023   Log(":) Init Event");
00024 }
00025 
00026 bool Event::Empty() {
00027   return queue_->empty();
00028 }

00030 /*
00031      NPKeyEvent key;
00032      NPCharacterEvent character;
00033      NPMouseEvent mouse;

00040 void appendMouseInfo(std::stringstream* out, NPPepperEvent* e) {
00041   // >out< | a pointer to stringstream, add some mouse info from --
00042   // >e    | a pointer to a pepper event
00043   
00044   *out << "Modifier: " << e->u.mouse.modifier << ", ";
00045   *out << "Button: " << e->u.mouse.button << ", ";
00046   *out << "<" << e->u.mouse.x << ", " << e->u.mouse.y << ">, ";
00047   *out << "ClickCount: " << e->u.mouse.clickCount;
00048 }
00049 
00050 NPPepperEvent* Event::PopEvent() {
00051   if (queue_->empty()) {
00052     return 0;
00053   }
00054   NPPepperEvent* val = queue_->front();
00055   queue_->pop();
00056   return val;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void Event::Drain() {
00060   Log("Draining");
00061   while (!Empty())
00062     PopEvent();
00063 }
00064 
00065 void Event::PushEvent(NPPepperEvent* e) {
00066   // > e    | a pointer to a pepper event is pushed onto queue_
00067   // < void |
00068   
00069   assert(e != NULL);
00070   assert(queue_ != NULL);
00071 
00072   std::stringstream out;
00073   out << "handled Event: ";
00074   out << e->type << " ";
00075 
00076   queue_->push(e);
00077 
00078   switch (e->type) {
00079     case NPEventType_Undefined:
00080       out << "Undefined";
00081       break;
00082     case NPEventType_MouseDown:
00083       out << "MouseDown" << e << " | ";
00084       appendMouseInfo(&out, e);
00085       break;
00086     case NPEventType_MouseUp:
00087       out << "MouseUp";
00088       appendMouseInfo(&out, e);
00089       break;
00090     case NPEventType_MouseMove:
00091       out << "MouseMove";
00092       appendMouseInfo(&out, e);
00093       break;
00094     case NPEventType_MouseEnter:
00095       out << "MouseEnter";
00096       appendMouseInfo(&out, e);
00097       break;
00098     case NPEventType_MouseLeave:
00099       out << "MouseLeave";
00100       appendMouseInfo(&out, e);
00101       break;
00102     case NPEventType_MouseWheel:
00103       out << "MouseWheel";
00104       appendMouseInfo(&out, e);
00105       break;
00106     case NPEventType_RawKeyDown:
00107       out << "RawKeyDown";
00108       break;
00109     case NPEventType_KeyDown:
00110       out << "KeyDown";
00111       break;
00112     case NPEventType_KeyUp:
00113       out << "KeyUp";
00114       break;
00115     case NPEventType_Char:
00116       out << "Char";
00117       break;
00118     case NPEventType_Minimize:
00119       out << "Minimize";
00120       break;
00121     case NPEventType_Focus:
00122       out << "Focus";
00123       break;
00124     case NPEventType_Device:
00125       out << "Device";
00126       break;
00127   }
00128   Log(out.str());
00129 
00130 }
00131 }  // namespace scm
